The Legend of the Hero, The Legendary Hero: Hero of
Legend.
HenrikoFaces4
Henriko
\N[1]!\. Is this like the
Legend of you?\. You've gotta read it!
It is said,\. that when a great evil threatens the
world,\. a hero will awaken to confront the evil.
HenrikosFaces-Sheet-export
Henriko
Okay!\. We know that part!
However,\. though the term "awaken" is used,\. this is
not the most accurate way to describe the hero's
forthcoming.\. In fact,\. the hero will simply travel
to this world when they deem fit to do so.
HenrikosFaces-Sheet-export
Henriko
What?\. So you just came to this world
because you had nothing better to do?

Let's keep reading.

Let's keep reading.

Let's keep reading.
In fact,\. the Legendary Hero will not actually travel
to this world at all!\. The real Legendary Hero lies
a universe away,\. in a different reality altogether.

Different reality?\. Wait,\. I'm confused.\.
So you're not actually the real Legendary
Hero?

A universe away!?\. That's an awfully long
distance.\. You're telling me that this
Legendary Hero is a sham?
HeroSabrinaExpressions4
Different universe!\. Well,\. if you're not
the Legendary Hero,\. then who the heck are
you?
FoxWizardFaces
Again, let's keep reading.
RabbitWizardFaces
Again, let's keep reading.
BearWizardFaces
Again, let's keep reading.
The real Legendary Hero will open a window between
this reality and their reality,\. and take control of
an avatar, or, "vessel", to facilitate their connection
with this world.
All of the avatar's decisions are also the decisions of
the real Legendary Hero.\. In this sense,\. the Legendary
Hero and the avatar are one and the same.
HenrikosFaces-Sheet-export
Henriko
You mean to tell me that you're just a
puppet being controlled by some weirdo
in another world?

Fascinating.

Fascinating.
BearWizardFaces
Fascinating!

That's very strange, but\..\..\..you still
seem like a very nice person, \N[1].\.
I'm sure whoever's pulling your strings is
just as nice as you as well.
HeroBethinaExpressions
\N[1],\. I'd like you to know
that,\. even with this newfound information
of your origins,\. it won't put a damper
on our relationship at all.
HeroSabrinaExpressions
That's actually pretty rad.\. I wish I could
meet the other you, \N[1].\.
Tell them how awesome they are and stuff.
The Legendary Hero has a special ability.\. Death has
little meaning to them in this world.\. If the avatar
fails to save the world,\. the Legendary Hero can simply
"try again," and create an alternate reality.

Henriko
Whoa whoa whoa,\. slow down.\. This is a lot
to take in all at once.
In this sense,\. there are an infinite number of realities
that are possible for the Legendary Hero.\. That means,\.
an infinite number of realities where the avatar doesn't
win,\. and a lesser infinite of realities in which it does.

The title of the book reads "The Legend of the Hero,
The Legendary Hero: Hero of Legend."
Read it?
Yes
No
Yes
The Legend of the Hero, The Legendary Hero: Hero of
Legend.
It is said,\. that when a great evil threatens the
world,\. a hero will awaken to confront the evil.
However,\. though the term "awaken" is used,\. this is
not the most accurate way to describe the hero's
forthcoming.\. In fact,\. the hero will simply travel
to this world when they deem fit to do so.
In fact,\. the Legendary Hero will not actually travel
to this world at all!\. The real Legendary Hero lies
a universe away,\. in a different reality altogether.
The real Legendary Hero will open a window between
this reality and their reality,\. and take control of
an avatar, or, "vessel", to facilitate their connection
with this world.
All of the avatar's decisions are also the decisions of
the real Legendary Hero.\. In this sense,\. the Legendary
Hero and the avatar are one and the same.
The Legendary Hero has a special ability.\. Death has
little meaning to them in this world.\. If the avatar
fails to save the world,\. the Legendary Hero can simply
"try again," and create an alternate reality.
In this sense,\. there are an infinite number of realities
that are possible for the Legendary Hero.\. That means,\.
an infinite number of realities where the avatar doesn't
win,\. and a lesser infinite of realities in which it does.
If the Legendary Hero guides the avatar well,\. victory
is certain.\. This author is confident that the
Legendary Hero will successfully save the day,\.
whenever an evil force may beckon.
No
It's a book of articles chronicling "The Land's Mysteries".
One article details a strange altar on top of a mountain.
There's an image of a large, tri-colored triangle with a
pedestal at each of its corners.\. Hmm...
It's a book detaling the history of Halcyon and its
people.\. You don't really care about that right now...
It's a journal chronicling a cave explorer's findings
while exploring caves.\. "Volume 1," apparently.\.
Would you like to read it?
Yes
No
Yes
Hey there, fellow spelunkers!\. It's me, Craig the crazy
caver!\. Right now, I'm exploring the Cave of Darkness
Unending, and let me tell ya, it's just as dark in here
as they say.\.
There's a large section of the cave where large boulders
keep rolling over the path,\. and no matter how long I wait,
they just do not stop rolling by.
What's very strange is that these boulders don't feel
like natural products of this cave system.\. Could
somebody have brought these boulders here intentionally
and automated them to keep rolling forever and ever?
If this is the case,\. where is the mechanism that is
controlling all of these boulders?\. It must be tucked
away out of reach somewhere if such a machine exists...
This entry is getting pretty long, and I'm only about
halfway through this cave!\. Join me next time for more
cave spelunking action!\. Right now,\. I've got an
avalanche of boulders to dodge!\. In the dark!
No
It's a journal chronicling a cave explorer's findings
while exploring caves.\. "Volume 2," apparently.\.
Would you like to read it?
Yes
No
Yes
Hey there, fellow spelunkers!\. It's me, Craig the crazy
caver!\. I just barely made it out of that boulder field
alive,\. but I'm ready to see what else the Cave of
Unending Darkness has in store for me!\. Let's go!
I've hit rock bottom of this cave!\. You can really feel
the pressure down here.\. It's almost enough to make you
go insane!\. Luckily for me,\. I'm already crazy!
What's this?\. The rough cave walls have given way to
organized bricklayed structures?\. Interesting.\. I
wonder how long this has been here...what are these
strange images?
There seems to be 9 open rooms within these catacombs,
arranged 3 by 3.\. Seven rooms have an image of a unique
face painted on the floor, one of the rooms has a peaceful-
looking statue,\. and the middle room has nothing at all...
I have so many questions.\. How long have these rooms
been down here?\. Where did they come from?\. Is this
some sort of puzzle?\. And if so,\. how would one go about
solving it?\ And is there treasure to claim for the solver?
All of these questions I have no answer to.\. Maybe I'm
just not the right guy to solve it?
Anyway,\. it's time I get out of this cave.\. Tune in
next time for more crazy cave adventures with your
friend Craig, the crazy caver!
And if any of you would like to explore the Cave of
Darkness Unending, don't forget to bring your flashlights!\.
See you guys on the other side!\.
-Craig
No
It's a poem about a haunted house\..\..\..will you read it?
Yes
No
Yes
Deep in the Forsaken Forest
North of Lone Pumpkin Lake
There is a spooky creepy cottage
Lying in wait like a snake
For within its walls the ghouls do haunt
Waiting to satisfy their ghoulish wants
So children, be wise to listen here
Woe be ye who enter there

It's a newspaper.\. They still print these?\.
The main headline is about The Benefactor.\.
Public opinion is apprehensive about his takeover,\.
but interested to see where it goes...
This paper was printed about two weeks ago...

It's a book all about cats.\. Cute!
It's a book entitled "The Amazing Imagination Machine"
written by someone named Bailey Day.\.
You turn it open to page 1...
"When Jake got his license, there were three things he
promised his mother he would never do: take the family
car without permission, knowingly break traffic laws,
or leave the house after ten o'clock at night.
Yet here he was, breaking all three promises at the
exact same time."
Perhaps you'll have to read the rest someday.
It's a Goosebumps book by R. L. Stine.\.
You feel like you're going to be in for a scare...
The shelf is full of Isekai mangas.\.
You can relate...
It's a Minimonicon!\. You flip it open to reveal a
plethora of colorful monsters.\. You find the entry
of a monster that interests you...

It's a book about various mythological and cryptid
creatures.
There's a comic book next to it about various mythological

It's a book all about dogs.\. Cute!
